Articles.Content:
Hello! I am a new user to the forums (but have been using the mod section for a while) but not a very new user of KSP. (one month old, best achievement being landing a kerbal on Bop in sandbox) I frequent r/kerbalspaceprogram, r/KerbalAcademy, and r/ScottManley, but never used the forum. So, I decided to sign up for this!

Still will be using Reddit more than the forum, but the forums are, very soon, going to stop just being a hub of mods for me.
Hello Sp33d3h. I also poke around the Kerbal Reddit sometimes, but this forum is more active. Anyway, welcome to the forum.
